Eevee

The EEVEE version allows you to quickly generate and position the nebula.

Advantages

  • Faster than Cycles.

  • Quickly visualise the effect in the viewport.

  • Best at still shots and backgrounds

Disadvantages

  • When animating, a strobing effect can occur. This is because EEVEE converts the nebula to flat 2D cards when rendering. The Cycles version does not have this issue.

  • Edges of the clouds can appear slightly blurred, which can be sharpened if you can change Blender’s code slightly.
